1.0.name: wordpress/free-translation
1.0.description:
Free Translation widget is provided by Applied Language Solutions http://www.appliedlanguage.com. When placed in your blog's sidebar it allows users to select a language and have your entire blog translated into their selected language.

Languages Supported:

*English *German *Dutch *Italian *Japanese *Korean *French *Portuguese *Spanish *Russian *Chinese

If the hyperlink to http://www.appliedlanguage.com is removed the free translation service will be deactivated.
